io.craigmiller160.school.repo

Interface GenericJoinHolderDao<T extends JoinHolder>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - an entity that implements the JoinHolder interface.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GenericJoinHolderDaoBean<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HibernateScJoinHolderDao

    public interface GenericJoinHolderDao<T extends JoinHolder>
    A generic interface for DAO objects handling JoinHolder interfaces. It provides special operations for interacting with the entities of a database via a join table. If operations are needed to interact with the JoinHolders directly, this interface can be used alongside an implementation of standard DAO methods. It can be implemented with basic JDBC implementations or ORM frameworks.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    craig

    • Method Detail

      • getAllJoinsFor

        <U> java.util.List<T> getAllJoinsFor(java.lang.Class<U> joinedEntityType,
                                     int entityId)
        Get a list of JoinHolder entities that are joined with the entity whose type and unique ID are specified in the parameters.
        Type Parameters:
        U - the type of entity that is joined.
        Parameters:
        joinedEntityType - the type of the entity to get the joins for.
        entityId - the ID of the entity to get the joins for.
        Returns:
        a list of JoinHolder entities that are joined with the specified entity.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the type of entity provided is not a valid type for this class's JoinHolder.

                        int entityId)

        Type Parameters:
        U - the type of entity that is joined.
        Parameters:
        joinedEntityType - the type of the entity to remove the joins for.
        entityId - the ID of the entity to remove the joins for.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the type of entity provided is not a valid type for this class's JoinHolder.

      • getJoinCountFor

        <U> long getJoinCountFor(java.lang.Class<U> joinedEntityType,
                         int entityId)
        Get a count of the number of JoinHolder entities that are joined with the entity whose type and unique ID are specified in the parameters.
        Type Parameters:
        U - the type of entity that is joined.
        Parameters:
        joinedEntityType - the type of the entity to count the joins for.
        entityId - the ID of the entity to count the joins for.
        Returns:
        the count of the number of JoinHolder entities that are joined with the entity.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the type of entity provided is not a valid type for this class's JoinHolder.
